title: State space decomposition and classification of term structure shapes in the two-factor Vasicek model. (arXiv:2303.13966v1 [q-fin.MF])
abstract: Using the concept of envelopes we show how to divide the state space $\RR^2$ of the two-factor Vasicek model into regions of identical term-structure shape. We develop a formula for determining the shapes utilizing winding numbers and give a nearly complete classification of the parameter space regarding the occurring shapes.

translated_title: 两因子Vasicek模型中的利率结构形状的状态空间分解与分类
translated_abstract: 我们利用包络的概念，展示了如何将两因子Vasicek模型的状态空间 $\RR^2$ 划分为具有相同利率结构形状的区域。我们开发了一个利用绕数确定形状的公式，并在参数空间方面给出了几乎完整的分类，以确定发生的形状。
tldr: 我们在两因子Vasicek模型中实现了状态空间的分解，得出了利率结构形状的公式，并进行了分类，以便更好地理解利率市场。
en_tdlr: We achieved state space decomposition in the two-factor Vasicek model, obtained a formula for term structure shape and provided a classification in order to better understand the interest rate market.
